resources.string: Lie flat on your back. If possible, put a towel under the ankle of your affected leg. You may need another person to help you with this activity.
Place the phone flat on your thigh. When ready, tap the screen to take the first of four measurements.
Place the phone flat on your shin. When ready, tap the screen to take the second of four measurements.

Slowly slide your foot back to bend your knee as far as you can without pain. When your knee is fully bent, tap the screen to take the third measurement. If it hurts, stop immediately and return your knee back to the table.
Keeping your knee bent, place the phone flat against your shin. When ready tap the screen to take the final measurement.
